title: New Pages Feed
content:
[[include fragment:nav-generic-css]]
[[module CSS]]
.feature {
    --box-accent: #708192;
    border: 0.25rem solid;
    border-image: linear-gradient(186deg, #d2e2ec, #96acb7) 8;
}
.feature .content-type-description > div {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill,minmax(min(16em,100%),1fr));
    gap: .05rem;
    background: #d7d7d7;
}
.feature .content-type-description > div > div {
    text-align: center;
    padding: 0.625rem;
    background: #fff;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}

#u-other .wiki-content-table td:nth-child(3) {
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 0.875em;
    width: 5.5rem;
}

#u-other .wiki-content-table td:nth-child(3) a:not([href$=admin],[href$=hub],[href$=contest],[href$=workbench],[href$=supplement],[href$=site],[href$=guide],[href$=essay],[href$=news],[href$=resource],[href$=author],[href$=component],[href$=component-backend],[href*=theme],[href$=more-by],[href$=splash],[href$=redirect]){
    display: none;
}
.description > :not(.preview) { display: none!important; }
.description > .preview {
    display: contents;
    font-size: .825em;
    text-align: start;
}
.preview > p {
    margin-block: .625em;
}
[[/module]]

[[include :scp-wiki:component:earthworm
| first=false | last=false | hub=yes
| previous-url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/shortest-pages-this-month | previous-title=Shortest Pages
| next-url=https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/top-rated-pages-this-month | next-title=Top Rated Pages
| hub-url=/ | hub-title=New Pages Feed
]]

= For a single list of all newly created pages, see [[[most-recently-created|]]].

[!--

[[div class="content-box feature" id="k8000"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Random 8000 Contest Entries
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages tags="+8000 -hub" perPage="6" limit="6" order="random" separate="false"]]
[[div class="%%name%%"]]
[[div_ class="title"]]
%%title_linked%%
[[/div]]
[[div class="description"]]
%%content{2}%%
[[/div]]
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[scp8000contesthub|]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-box feature" id="rewrite"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Recent Rewrite Entries
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages tags="+rewrite -admin" perPage="6" limit="6" order="created_at desc" separate="false"]]
[[div_]]
%%title_linked%%
[[/div]]
[[/module]]

[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[Articles Eligible for Rewrite]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

--]

------

[[div class="content-grid"]]

[!-- SCP Block --]

[[div class="content-box" id="scp"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Recent SCPs
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages name="scp-*" rating=">=-10" tags="-001-proposal -admin -artwork -author -contest -component -component-backend -creepypasta -essay -forum -fragment -goi-format -guide -hub -deletion-range -deletable -in-rewrite -news -more-by -orphaned -project -redirect -sandbox -site -splash -supplement -tale -theme -workbench -_theme-temp" order="created_at desc" separate="false" category="_default adult" perPage="12" limit="60" urlAttrPrefix="scp" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ [[size 0%]]Date Created[[/size]]ðŸ“†ï¸Ž ||~ [[size 0%]]Comments[[/size]]ðŸ’¬ï¸Ž ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Tale Block --]

[[div class="content-box tale" id="tale"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Recent Tales
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages rating=">=-10" tags="tale 001-proposal" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="12" limit="60" category="*" urlAttrPrefix="tale" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ [[size 0%]]Date Created[[/size]]ðŸ“†ï¸Ž ||~ [[size 0%]]Comments[[/size]]ðŸ’¬ï¸Ž ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[foundation-tales|]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- GoI Format Block --]

[[div class="content-box goi" id="goi"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Recent GoI Formats
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages rating=">=-10" tags=" goi-format" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="8" limit="40" category="*" urlAttrPrefix="goi" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ [[size 0%]]Date Created[[/size]]ðŸ“†ï¸Ž ||~ [[size 0%]]Comments[[/size]]ðŸ’¬ï¸Ž ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[goi-formats|]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Art Block --]

[[div class="content-box art" id="art"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Recent Artworks
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages rating=">=-10" tags="artist artwork" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="8" limit="40" category="*" urlAttrPrefix="art" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ [[size 0%]]Date Created[[/size]]ðŸ“†ï¸Ž ||~ [[size 0%]]Comments[[/size]]ðŸ’¬ï¸Ž ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%comments%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[[artwork-hub|]]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

------

[[div class="content-grid"]]

[!-- Other Block --]

[[div class="content-box alt" id="other"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Other Pages
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]
[[module ListPages rating=">=-10" category="*" tags="-scp -tale -goi-format -deletable -deletion-range -in-rewrite -redirect -artwork -adult admin archived author component contest  essay guide hub news orphaned resource project sandbox site splash supplement template theme workbench" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="15" limit="75" urlAttrPrefix="other" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ [[size 0%]]Date Created[[/size]]ðŸ“†ï¸Ž ||~ Type ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% || %%tags_linked%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[!-- Untagged Block --]

[[div class="content-box alt" id="untagged"]]
[[div class="content-type-title"]]
Untagged Pages
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-description"]]

[[module ListPages rating=">=-10" tags="-admin -archived -artist -artwork -author -component -component-backend -contest  -essay -forum -fragment -goi-format -guide -hub -deletion-range -deletable -in-rewrite -more-by -news -redirect -resource -orphaned -project -sandbox -scp -site -splash -supplement -tale -theme -unlisted -workbench -_theme-temp" order="created_at desc" separate="false" perPage="20" category="* -deleted" urlAttrPrefix="untagged" prependLine="||~ Page ||~ [[size 0%]]Date Created[[/size]]ðŸ“†ï¸Ž ||"]]
|| %%title_linked%% || %%created_at|%Y.%m.%e|agohover%% ||
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
[[div class="content-type-footer"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box
|author=Staff]]

author: RJB_R
